text: Matthew R. Joyce (born August 3, 1984) is an outfielder for the Oakland Athletics. He has also played for the Detroit Tigers, Tampa Bay Rays, Los Angeles Angels of Anaheim, and Pittsburgh Pirates. In 2011, Joyce was picked to play in the Major League Baseball All-Star Game.Topkin, Marc. title: Matt Joyce
